concept.title: Payroll Processing Management
concept.shortdesc: Manage payroll processing functions using the Payroll Gateway page.

conbody.p: The Payroll Gateway provides the flexibility to access several payroll-related functions from a single Web page, allowing you to complete the following tasks:

ul.li: Process payroll By Pay Group or By Status
View payroll processing statuses and associated payroll models for pay groups from Process Pay section
View the Pay Calendar and payroll dates for a pay group
Run select reports from Payroll Reports section

Manage payroll actions from the Things I Can Do section:
Create instant checks/cheques
Adding Off-Cycle Payroll
Manage Prior Quarter Adjustments
View Time Import File History
View Time Import Details
Unresolved Payroll Items
View Employee Pay Transferred to Payroll
View Status of Direct Deposit Group Files
View Pending Pay Items Detail
View Pending Pay Items Status History

Access payroll business rules, including adding or changing the following:
Payroll models
Time entry templates
Deductions
Earnings
Pay groups

conbody.p: From the Payroll Gateway page, you can also select the Full Page View icon to access the Process Pay page and process payrolls by either pay group or status.
